March 30, 2023 - I’ve noticed that several of the hot-and-savory varieties are “out-of-stock” on the Huel web site, but still available on Amazon at a steep markup! Is someone “gaming” Huel? I.e., buying out the store and then turning around and flipping the goods at much higher prices on Amazon?
